ComicInfo.Title: The Sands of Khasa Tahid; City of Time Lost
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Sands of Khasa Tahid
Jonny, Hadji, and Race are sent out to Chandarkin Oasis to scout out an area which Dr. Quest suspects may have an ancient city buried beneath its sands. Upon reaching the area they fail to discover an ancient city but instead find trouble in the form of terrorists who are being supplied by an old enemy...
City of Time Lost
The Quest team explore the now revealed (due to events in 'The Sands of Khasa Tahid') ancient city and discover that there may to something to the legends that proclaim the city provides its inhabitants with immortality.

ComicInfo.Characters: Roger "Race" Bannon,Jonny Quest,Bandit (dog),Hadji,Jezebel Jade,Dr. Benton Quest
